item.title: Activity - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: Activity Recent Administrator on Indonesian Wikipedia (my Wikipedia account). Make some tweet on Indonesian Wikipedia official Twitter account, along with my besties to help me. ;) Maintain Evelyn -VTuber- Discord server as moderator. Watching YouTube (especially Virtual YouTuber) in free time. Past September 26, 2019: Speaker on “#LIFEonTwitter” at Twitter Indonesia, Jakarta represent Indonesian Wikipedia (report on Twitter Blog). December 16, 2016: Speaker on “Social Media National Seminar” at Airlangga University, Surabaya.

item.title: Canary - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: Canary Introduction You can read Warrant canary if you want to know more about this page. This is a canary statement for Nohirara. All of statements here are (heavily) referenced from -revi Meta sub-user page. Current statement -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE----- Hash: SHA512 As of 2021-01-22 (January 22, 2021), Nohirara (me) and all of my accounts [1] are control this PGP key (fingerprint: CC95 6E13 40C5 8EB5 9FBA 542C C77B 602D E8CD 650C).

item.title: Contact me - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: Contact me E-mail {first_name}@outlook.com is my main e-mail address (you can guess it, do you? ;)). Please note that I’ve tight schedule on behalf of my work, and the result I can’t reply some of your e-mail on time. But, promise me, I will reply your e-mail immediately as possible. You can use PGP to encrypt your e-mail to me: more info. Social media and instant messaging Twitter Facebook Instagram Keybase Telegram (for IM, I prefer this method) Facebook Messenger Discord I’m also active on Discord, and you can find me at Nohirara [Wikimin]#1283.

item.title: Disclaimer - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: Disclaimer Any opinions I express online and/or activities on internet under “Nohirara” (as my) name,1 unless stated otherwise, are solely my own and not represents Indonesian Wikipedia. Footnote(s) All of my accounts ↩︎

item.title: PGP - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: PGP Last key update: October 8, 2020 You can download my public key (fingerprint CC95 6E13 40C5 8EB5 9FBA 542C C77B 602D E8CD 650C) from here. Interested using PGP? I’m using PGP to encrypt my email. If you interested to use PGP, go here to read some explanations and here to watch how to use it. I recommend you to using Keybase as first step to learn.

item.title: Statement - Nohirara Swadayana
item.description: Statement If something happens to me, I will make a statement and bundle all of them in this page. Please note that most (or all) of statements I made, they’re only available in Indonesian language. (not available)
